articles.title: Indian American Couple Convicted For Forcing Cousin Into Labour - NDTV
articles.description: Following a two-week trial, a federal jury in Virginia has convicted an Indian American couple of conspiracy to commit forced labour, at a gas station and convenience store in the State, a US attorney has said.
articles.content:
The couple left victim at the store to sleep in a back office for days at a time on multiple occasions.

articles.title: U.S. strikes Iranian-backed militias in Iraq over wave of attacks on American forces - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. struck targets in Iraq on Tuesday to retaliate for attacks Iranian-backed militias have been launching against American forces.
